content: if you ever crocheted a disaster sock before it probably wasn t your fault crochet socks that don t have the perfect yarn/pattern combination will be too thick won t stay up and can be downright uncomfortable to walk on that s not the case with these socks with this pattern you ll learn how to crochet a properly fitting sock with the perfect sock yarn gone are the days you have to skip out on handmade socks because you don t know how to knit there is a video tutorial for these socks available on youtube https //www youtube com/watch v=4zmcl_i3ydi 1 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=4zmcl_i3ydi
